product_description: Oxford Legal Pads are proudly made in America—manufactured in Covington, Tennessee, ensuring high-quality craftsmanship and attention to detail. These 8.5 x 11.75 inch legal pad 3-packs are incredibly versatile, making them perfect for a wide range of uses such as law school note-taking, writing out detailed to-do lists, grocery lists, meeting notes, daily task tracking, and much more. Each pad has 50 perforated sheets of premium canary yellow paper. The micro-perforations allow you to remove pages cleanly and effortlessly, making it easy to start fresh notes on the next sheet without tearing or damaging the pad. The canary yellow paper is purposefully designed to reduce eye strain, offering a more comfortable writing experience during extended periods of notetaking. They are ideal for power users, students, or professionals alike. These legal pads feature wide ruling on both sides of the sheet, with precise 11/32-inch (0.3-inch) spacing between lines. This wide ruling allows for larger handwriting so it's easy to see your notes at a glance. Each notepad sheet detaches to 8.5" x 11", with an overall size of 8.5" x 11.75". Whether you're jotting down quick reminders or drafting out more formal ideas, Oxford Legal Pads offer a reliable solution for daily writing tasks. Their durability, clean perforation lines, and quality paper make them a trusted companion in both academic and professional settings.
